thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Rebecca

author: Rebecca
title: Rebecca
text: I love using Thrift Books and rarely have been disappointed. My one concern is, with the new ordering format, I do not know where the books are being shipped from. In the past, I tried to get as many books from the same warehouse to hopefully save you all money and time. I order monthly for a small book club. I have been ordering for years and only once had a problem which was corrected quickly.
